products.title: Calista Lust Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Calista lust roller blind in red/multicoloured. Made to measure from 12.12 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The calista range comes in many variations of expressive colours to suit your needs, this would suit any room no matter how big or small, a very beautiful addition.
This vibrant multicoloured roller blind with a splash of red is perfect to bring an understated yet stylish pattern into your home.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1466 fabric colour: lust material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Calista Lust Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Calista lust electric roller blind in red/multicoloured. Made to measure from 152.71 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The calista range comes in many variations of expressive colours to suit your needs, this would suit any room no matter how big or small, a very beautiful addition. 
 
This vibrant multicoloured roller blind with a splash of red is perfect to bring an understated yet stylish pattern into your home. The electric aspect of this blind makes is easy to use and ideal for those hard to reach windows.
 
 Product id: db-erbx1466 fabric colour: lust material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
